p: The presence of antibodies was detected in a high proportion of persons, contrary to what is generally seen in most parts of the world, in Brazil (1–2%) and in the Amazon (0.9–2.4%) region [ 6, 7, 28]. In a small community in the State of Para, in the municipality of Cameta, the prevalence of antibodies to HCV was found to be 8.8% and viral RNA was detected among 62.5% [ 9] of the positive samples which was still lower than in the present study. Sexual transmission of the virus could explain its large dissemination as it is a probable risk factor involved in the North region [ 29].
